cyclone.name: ZETA
cyclone.current_location: about 85 miles ESE of Progreso, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: moving northwest across the southern Gulf today, then turning north-northeast toward the northern Gulf Coast (southeast Louisiana to Mississippi/Alabama coast) by late Wednesday

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch west of Morgan City to Intracoastal City, Louisiana (well east of Texas)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Morgan City LA to MS/AL border; Storm Surge Warning Intracoastal City LA to Navarre FL
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Gulf Coast from southeast Louisiana eastward to the western Florida Panhandle
weather_observation.wind: Occasional gusty winds 15â€“25 mph possible as outer gradient tightens, but gale-force winds unlikely.
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor water level rise under 2 ft possible; no significant surge threat.
weather_observation.rainfall: Light to locally moderate showers, totals generally under 1 inch.
weather_observation.other_hazards: None anticipated that would materially affect port operations.
